header.usp: I design and build Full Stack Applications.

paragraph: A self-taught full-stack developer and digital creator on a mission to turn ideas into impact. I specialize in building fast, responsive, and elegant web experiences using modern technologies like Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. What sets me apart isn’t just code — it’s consistency, clarity, and a relentless drive to grow. From clean UI design to performance-optimized logic, I take pride in crafting solutions that not only work but feel right. Whether it’s a client project, an open-source tool, or a personal experiment — I give it everything I’ve got, every single day.
